thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Phil Houghton
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Phil Houghton

author: Phil Houghton
title: Phil Houghton
text: Straight forward, easy and plenty of reviews to help pick out a good company to install your Solar. I think the service is excellent and perhaps should expand into other areas such as trades (electrical/plumbing/etc). There are so many sharks out there, hopefully by using this service the chances of you getting bitten will be reduced to almost nothing.
